{"id":1477556056,"question_id":932,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1734068326,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1477556056/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"100.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMonotonic(vector<int>& nums) {\n        bool inc = true;\n        bool dec = true;\n        for(int i=1; i<nums.size(); i++) {\n            inc &= (nums[i-1] <= nums[i]);\n            dec &= (nums[i-1] >= nums[i]);\n        };\n        return inc || dec;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
